title: Sci-Fi Interface Sound Effects 2
description: A collection of sounds of futuristic interfaces working, containing 104 sound effects for activations, deactivations, buttons, devices, generators, launches, lockouts and more.
longDescription:
Audio Preview: https://soundcloud.com/magic-sound-effects/sets/sci-fi-interface-sounds-2

Sound List: https://www.dropbox.com/scl/fi/rdild6vhpdl63j50arhhc/MSE-Sci-Fi-Interface-Sounds-2.pdf?rlkey=8qaazrqswan0yiguku878qg4m&dl=0


The package contains 104 working and interacting sound effects of sci-fi interfaces, including:

  • 7 activation sounds
  • 6 airlocks
  • 5 sounds of broken devices
  • 20 buttons
  • 8 sounds of deactivation
  • 4 device sounds
  • 12 generator sounds
  • 10 launches
  • 7 lockouts
  • 4 mechanism sounds
  • 12 shutdown sounds
  • 2 sounds of signal
  • 7 working sounds of interfaces


Sounds are great for use in futuristic games for opening and closing futuristic doors of starships, spaceships, stations and bases; movement of robots; device buttons; activating, deactivating and locking interfaces; background atmospheric sounds of space stations and ships, control rooms with devices.


For support and other questions, please send an email to: magic.sound.effects@gmail.com.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • 104 sound effects
  • 44.1 khz, 16 bit, wav, stereo
  • many variations of interface sounds
  • 13 types of sci-fi interface sound effects in total
  • perfect for animations, trailers, game scenes of various genres


Number of Audio Waves: 104

Number of Audio Cues: 104

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz / 16 Bit

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 02 minutes 44 seconds

Supported Development Platforms:

  • Windows: Yes
  • Mac: Yes
